fulltext:
Nguyen Huynh Anh Vu 
264/22 Le Quang Dinh, Binh Thanh district, Ho Chi Minh City 
0978242742 
anhvu2889@gmail.com 
Skype: anhvu2889 
SUMMARY 
Software engineer with over 6 years’ experience in software development (Android, iOS mobile 
applications and single page application).  
Startup experience of entire application lifecycle (concept, design, test, release and support), able 
to design and implement systems with a focus on performance, scalability, security, and 
deployment. 
SKILLS AND TECHNOLOGIES: 
o Hands-on experience working with native Android/iOS architecture, frameworks and hybrid 
applications (Titanium, Sencha Touch...) 
o Have deep domain knowledge: finance technology, healthcare, gambling system, E-commerce 
o Not only focus on evaluating and applying consistently engineering best practice, writing clean 
code, but also love sharing knowledge about software development technologies and 
methodologies (Agile, Lean...).  
o Open-minded, honest and have a positive attitude towards people 
o Self-driven and proactive in keeping up with new technologies and programming languages, 
interesting in critical thinking, design thinking and how to apply them in software 
development. 
o Ability to coach and mentor team members in their professional development and build self-
sustaining teams 
o Strong engineering professional with a Bachelor's degree focused in Information Technology 
from University of Science (HCMC) - Viet Nam National University 
CAREER OBJECTIVES 
o Looking for a professional and friendly environment where I can maximize my contribution 
with the software development experience I have learned, not only about building product, 
but build the team to build product, with the same passion, motivation and culture. 
o I would like the opportunity to work directly with customer, so I can provide solution for 
software development and increase quality of outcome. 
o Interesting in Machine Learning, Artificial intelligence and blockchain. I am glad to have 
opportunity to work and apply them. 
o A leadership position is preferred, but a technical position (Front End or Back End) where I can 
gain a deep understanding of technology and system design is also great. 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
Techcom Securities (Dec 2017 – Present) 
List of projects:  
TCInvest (Dec 2017 – Present) 
o Description:  
§ Techcom Securities is investment banking department of Techcombank. 
§ Customer (Investor) will use iOS application to self-place order/preorder bond products 
(buy/sell). They can also use application to view benefit illustration, manage order, sign 
contract, view history detail, confirm survey, manage portfolio and update news, 
promotion via push notification. 
§ RM (Relationship manager of Bank) can also use application to suggest product to 
customer, manage list of customers. 
o Role: 
§ Mobile Tech Lead 
§ Scrum Master 
o Technology stack 
§ Swift, RxSwift, RxCocoa, Clean Architecture, XCode, Firebase Cloud Messaging, Google 
Analytics, Crashlytics. 
o Achievements: 
§ Release iOS version on App Store 
§ https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/tcinvest-%C4%91%E1%BA%A7u-t%C6%B0-an-
to%C3%A0n/id1353331853?mt=8 
Forix (July 2016 – Nov 2017) 
List of projects:  
Leupold (Feb 2017 – Nov 2017) 
o Description:  
§ Leupold is an American manufacturer of telescopic sights, red dot sights, spotting scopes, 
and binoculars. 
§ The application was used to predict bullet trajectory. User can input or select firearm/load 
profiles, atmospheric, target data, then see outputs predicted trajectory as table or graph, 
and print PDF result. 
§ The application also can take in firearm/load profiles, display configuration, optional data, 
and then uploads all this data to the Leupold devices via Bluetooth. 
o Role: 
§ Senior Mobile Developer 
o Technology stack 
§ Java, Android SDK, Android Studio, Gradle, Dagger, Realm, Fabric 
o Achievements: 
§ Finish phase 1 with good feedbacks. 
Deschutes (July 2016 – Feb 2017) 
o Description:  
§ Franklin Electric is a leading global provider of systems and components for moving water 
and fuel. 
§ The application was developed for end user (engineers) to control Franklin products 
(electric motors in water systems or energy systems). 
§ After connecting with devices via Bluetooth LE, user can check status of products, change 
settings of electric motors, read logs to create, sign and send email or print PDF report. 
o Role: 
§ Senior Mobile Developer 
o Technology stack 
§ Java, Android SDK, Android Studio, Gradle, Dagger, Realm, Fabric 
o Achievements: 
§ Deliver application successfully with good performance. 
§ Demo video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sHlHzNyv_BE 
Harvey Nash Vietnam (May 2013 – June 2016) 
List of projects:  
Ford Smart Parking (February 2015 – June 2016) 
o Description:  
§ Ford is currently developing a Smart Parking solution in conjunction with the London 
borough of Islington. 
§ The system aims to improve many of the negative points associated with the experience of 
parking vehicles in congested urban environments. 
o Role: 
§ Senior Mobile Developer 
o Technology stack 
§ Java, Android SDK, Android Studio, Gradle, Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics, Google map, 
Here Map, ORMLite, JMock, Silverpop, Google Cloud Messaging. 
o Achievements: 
§ Got quick transfer from old developer and adapt project requirement after 2 weeks. 
§ Integrate successfully with IBM API Team.  
§ Increase Unit Test code coverage from 50% to over 80%. 
§ Increase performance and battery life. 
§ Got good comments from the Livework Feedback after user acceptance testing, the mobile 
application was released to Google Play. 
LG Watch Manager (August 2015 – October 2015) 
o Description:  
§ The LG Watch Manager project objective is to develop an application which can allow LG 
Watch (Web OS) to connect and synchronize with iOS devices (iPhone). 
o Role:  
§ Senior Mobile Developer (Support writing test) 
o Achievements: 
§ Support developing and deploying application successfully to App stores. 
§ Writing full Unit Test and got code coverage over 75%. 
Bodog  (May 2013 – December 2014) 
o Description:  
§ Bodog is an online gambling company.  
§ Build up mobile version for the website calvinayre.com (owner of Bodog), and the Asia 
version for the website bodog.eu (desktop and mobile), which allow people to join and 
play gambling. 
o Role:   
§ Senior Mobile Developer 
o Technology stack 
§ Javascript, Sencha Touch, AngularJS, HTML, CSS, SASS. 
o Achievements: 
§ Deliver successfully 2 single-page applications:  
http://calvinayre.com 
https://www.bodog888.com 
§ Got experience with HTML, CSS, SASS and web development 
Edge Works Software (March 2012 – April 2013) 
List of projects:  
Jio Health (August 2012 – April 2013) 
o Description:  
§ Jio Health is revolutionizing the way you manage your health and connect to your doctors.  
§ Track your vitals, log your food and nutrition, manage your medications, and securely 
connect with your providers and caregivers – all in one app. 
o Role:  
§ Mobile developer  
§ Java developer  
o Technology stack 
§ Javascript, Titanium, Java, Android SDK, iOS SDK, mySQL, Spring. 
o Achievements: 
§ Have strong experience with wearable devices (Fitbit watch, scale) 
§ Support Back End team to write API when having free time. 
§ Self-study then work alone in mobile development, but still release successfully mobile 
application (both iOS and Android versions): 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jiohealth.patient 
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/jio-health/id933157797?mt=8 
https://jiohealth.com/#!/ 
Harmful Vibration Detector (April 2012 – July 2012) 
o Description: 
§ The internal mobile application of enterprise system, which will detect and record the 
harmful vibration in working environment. The application will alert the user and send 
records to server. 
o Role:  
§ Mobile developer 
o Technology stack 
§ Java, Eclipse, Android SDK 
o Achievements: 
§ Release application successfully (Internal application). 
EDUCATION 
University of Science (HCMC) - Viet Nam National University 
Bachelor of Computer Science
